package.name: Net_Socket
package.description: Net_Socket is a class interface to TCP sockets. It provides blocking and non-blocking operation, with different reading and writing modes (byte-wise, block-wise, line-wise and special formats like network byte-order ip addresses).

release.notes: - Make package.xml safe for PEAR 1.4.0. - Chunk socket writes on Windows by default, or if explicitly specified (Bug #980) - Don't run any $addr with a '/' in it through gethostbyname() (Bug #3372)
Fixes for several longstanding bugs. Allow setting of stream context. Correctly read lines that only end in \n. Suppress PHP warnings.
Optimize away some duplicate is_resource() calls. Better solution for eof() on blocking sockets [#1427]. Add select() implementation [#1428].
Don't rely on gethostbyname() for error checking (Bug #3100).
